function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ambiguous terminology around 'experience of space and place' and its relation to contact with nature","Impact":"Confusion and misinterpretation of the concept leading to ineffective design and planning","Mitigation":"Provide a more explicit and clear expression of the concept","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Designers, architects, urban planners","Owner":"Design researchers, industry professionals"},{"Description":"Overlap and ambiguity in the categorization of nature-related elements in the frameworks","Impact":"Difficulty in applying the frameworks effectively and consistently","Mitigation":"Refine the frameworks to avoid overlap and provide clearer distinctions between categories","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Framework developers, researchers, industry professionals","Owner":"Academic and research institutions"},{"Description":"Requirement for specific arrangements for producing pleasurable experiences in nature-related spaces","Impact":"Ineffective design and planning of natural spaces and places leading to reduced well-being and connection to nature","Mitigation":"Develop guidelines for creating and managing natural spaces that enhance pleasurable experiences","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Designers, architects, urban planners","Owner":"Design research institutions, industry professionals"}]}
